65//*****************************************************************************
66//
71//
72//*****************************************************************************
73#define AM_HAL_I3C_INT_PIO_TXTHLD I3C_PIOINTRSTATUSENABLE_TXTHLDSTATEN_Msk
74#define AM_HAL_I3C_INT_PIO_RXTHLD I3C_PIOINTRSTATUSENABLE_RXTHLDSTATEN_Msk
75#define AM_HAL_I3C_INT_PIO_IBISTATUSTHLD I3C_PIOINTRSTATUSENABLE_IBISTATUSTHLDSTATEN_Msk
76#define AM_HAL_I3C_INT_PIO_CMDQUEUEREADY I3C_PIOINTRSTATUSENABLE_CMDQUEUEREADYSTATEN_Msk
77#define AM_HAL_I3C_INT_PIO_RESPREADY I3C_PIOINTRSTATUSENABLE_RESPREADYSTATEN_Msk
78#define AM_HAL_I3C_INT_PIO_TRANSFERABORT I3C_PIOINTRSTATUSENABLE_PIOTRANSFERABORTSTATEN_Msk
79#define AM_HAL_I3C_INT_PIO_TRANSFERERR I3C_PIOINTRSTATUSENABLE_PIOTRANSFERERRSTATEN_Msk
80#define AM_HAL_I3C_INT_HCINTERNALERR I3C_INTRSTATUSENABLE_HCINTERNALERRSTATEN_Msk
81#define AM_HAL_I3C_INT_HCSEQCANCEL I3C_INTRSTATUSENABLE_HCSEQCANCELSTATEN_Msk
82#define AM_HAL_I3C_INT_HCWARNCMDSEQSTALL I3C_INTRSTATUSENABLE_HCWARNCMDSEQSTALLSTATEN_Msk
83#define AM_HAL_I3C_INT_HCERRCMDSEQTIMEOUT I3C_INTRSTATUSENABLE_HCERRCMDSEQTIMEOUTSTATEN_Msk
84#define AM_HAL_I3C_INT_RHTRANSFERABORT (I3C_RHINTRSTATUSENABLE_RHTRANSFERABORTSTATEN_Msk << 16)
85#define AM_HAL_I3C_INT_IBIRINGFULL (I3C_RHINTRSTATUSENABLE_IBIRINGFULLSTATEN_Msk << 16)
86#define AM_HAL_I3C_INT_RHTRANSFERERR (I3C_RHINTRSTATUSENABLE_RHTRANSFERERRSTATEN_Msk << 16)
87#define AM_HAL_I3C_INT_RINGOP (I3C_RHINTRSTATUSENABLE_RINGOPSTATEN_Msk << 16)
88#define AM_HAL_I3C_INT_RHTRANSFERCOMPLETION (I3C_RHINTRSTATUSENABLE_RHTRANSFERCOMPLETIONSTATEN_Msk << 16)
89#define AM_HAL_I3C_INT_IBIREADY (I3C_RHINTRSTATUSENABLE_IBIREADYSTATEN_Msk << 16)
90#define AM_HAL_I3C_INT_ALL 0xFFFFFFFF
91#define AM_HAL_I3C_INT_ERR (AM_HAL_I3C_INT_HCINTERNALERR | AM_HAL_I3C_INT_PIO_TRANSFERERR | AM_HAL_I3C_INT_RHTRANSFERERR)
92
93#define AM_HAL_I3C_CMD0_DESPC_TOC (1 << 31)
94#define AM_HAL_I3C_CMD0_DESPC_ROC (1 << 30)
95
96#define AM_HAL_I3C_BROADCAST_ADDR 0x7E
97
98// Commands support both broadcast and unicast modes
99#define AM_HAL_I3C_CCC_ENEC(bc) ((bc) ? 0x0 : 0x80)
100#define AM_HAL_I3C_CCC_DISEC(bc) ((bc) ? 0x1 : 0x81)
101#define AM_HAL_I3C_CCC_ENTAS(as, bc) (((bc) ? 0x02 : 0x82) + (as))
102#define AM_HAL_I3C_CCC_RSTDAA(bc) ((bc) ? 0x6 : 0x86)
103#define AM_HAL_I3C_CCC_SETMWL(bc) ((bc) ? 0x9 : 0x89)
104#define AM_HAL_I3C_CCC_SETMRL(bc) ((bc) ? 0xA : 0x8A)
105#define AM_HAL_I3C_CCC_SETXTIME(bc) ((bc) ? 0x28 : 0x98)
106#define AM_HAL_I3C_CCC_VENDOR(bc, id) ((id) + ((bc) ? 0x61 : 0xE0))
107#define AM_HAL_I3C_CCC_RSTACT(bc) ((bc) ? 0x2A : 0x9A)
108
109// Commands only support broadcast modes
110#define AM_HAL_I3C_CCC_ENTDAA 0x7
111#define AM_HAL_I3C_CCC_DEFTGTS 0x8
112#define AM_HAL_I3C_CCC_ENTTM 0xB
113#define AM_HAL_I3C_CCC_ENTHDR0 0x20
114#define AM_HAL_I3C_CCC_ENTHDR1 0x21
115#define AM_HAL_I3C_CCC_ENTHDR2 0x22
116#define AM_HAL_I3C_CCC_SETAASA 0x29
117
118// Commands only support unicast modes
119#define AM_HAL_I3C_CCC_SETDASA 0x87
120#define AM_HAL_I3C_CCC_SETNEWDA 0x88
121#define AM_HAL_I3C_CCC_GETMWL 0x8B
122#define AM_HAL_I3C_CCC_GETMRL 0x8C
123#define AM_HAL_I3C_CCC_GETPID 0x8D
124#define AM_HAL_I3C_CCC_GETBCR 0x8E
125#define AM_HAL_I3C_CCC_GETDCR 0x8F
126#define AM_HAL_I3C_CCC_GETSTATUS 0x90
127#define AM_HAL_I3C_CCC_GETACCCR 0x91
128#define AM_HAL_I3C_CCC_SETBRGTGT 0x93
129#define AM_HAL_I3C_CCC_GETMXDS 0x94
130#define AM_HAL_I3C_CCC_GETCAPS 0x95
131#define AM_HAL_I3C_CCC_GETXTIME 0x99
132
133// Max ring number supported by I3C host
134#define AM_HAL_I3C_MAX_RING_NUM 4
135
136// Max Ring Size
137#define AM_HAL_I3C_MAX_RING_SIZE 255
138
139#define AM_HAL_I3C_TIMEOUT_CNT 100000
140#define AM_HAL_I3C_DELAY_US 10
141
142//
144//
145typedef enum
146{
147 AM_HAL_I3C_XFER_PIO,
148 AM_HAL_I3C_XFER_DMA,
149} am_hal_i3c_xfer_mode_e;
150
151//
153//
154typedef enum
155{
156 AM_HAL_I3C_SDR0 = 0x0, // 12MHz
157 AM_HAL_I3C_SDR1 = 0x1, // 8MHz
158 AM_HAL_I3C_SDR2 = 0x2, // 6MHz
159 AM_HAL_I3C_SDR3 = 0x3, // 4MHz
160 AM_HAL_I3C_SDR4 = 0x4, // 2MHz
161 AM_HAL_I3C_HDR_TS = 0x5,
162 AM_HAL_I3C_HDR_DDR = 0x6,
163 AM_HAL_I3C_I2C_MODE0 = 0x0, // 400KHz
164 AM_HAL_I3C_I2C_MODE1 = 0x1, // 1MHz
165 AM_HAL_I3C_I2C_MODE2 = 0x2, // User defined speed
166 AM_HAL_I3C_I2C_MODE3 = 0x3, // User defined speed
167 AM_HAL_I3C_I2C_MODE4 = 0x4, // User defined speed
168} am_hal_i3c_speed_mode_e;
169
170//
172//
173typedef enum
174{
175 AM_HAL_I3C_DIR_WRITE = 0x0,
176 AM_HAL_I3C_DIR_READ = 0x1,
177} am_hal_i3c_dir_e;
178
179//
181//
182typedef enum
183{
184 AM_HAL_I3C_DEVICE_I3C,
185 AM_HAL_I3C_DEVICE_I2C,
186} am_hal_i3c_device_type_e;
187
188//
190//
191typedef enum
192{
193 AM_HAL_I3C_EVT_TX_COMPLETE,
194 AM_HAL_I3C_EVT_RX_COMPLETE,
195 AM_HAL_I3C_EVT_IBI,
196 AM_HAL_I3C_EVT_ABORT,
197 AM_HAL_I3C_EVT_ERROR,
198} am_hal_i3c_event_type_e;
199
200//
202//
203typedef struct
204{
205 am_hal_i3c_event_type_e eType;
206 uint32_t ui32Context;
207 void *pCtxt;
208} am_hal_i3c_event_t;
209
210typedef void (*am_hal_i3c_event_cb_t)(am_hal_i3c_event_t *pEvent);
211
212//
214//
215typedef union
216{
217 uint32_t ui32CmdDesc0;
218 struct
219 {
220 uint32_t attr : 3;
221 uint32_t tid : 4;
222 uint32_t cmd : 8;
223 uint32_t cp : 1;
224 uint32_t idx : 5;
225 uint32_t rsvd : 3;
226 uint32_t sre : 1;
227 uint32_t dbp : 1;
228 uint32_t mode : 3;
229 uint32_t rnw : 1;
230 uint32_t roc : 1;
231 uint32_t toc : 1;
232 } RegCmdDesc0;
233 struct
234 {
235 uint32_t attr : 3;
236 uint32_t tid : 4;
237 uint32_t cmd : 8;
238 uint32_t cp : 1;
239 uint32_t idx : 5;
240 uint32_t rsvd : 2;
241 uint32_t dtt : 3;
242 uint32_t mode : 3;
243 uint32_t rnw : 1;
244 uint32_t roc : 1;
245 uint32_t toc : 1;
246 } ImmCmdDesc0;
247 struct
248 {
249 uint32_t attr : 3;
250 uint32_t tid : 4;
251 uint32_t cmd : 8;
252 uint32_t rsvd0 : 1;
253 uint32_t idx : 5;
254 uint32_t rsvd1 : 5;
255 uint32_t devcnt : 4;
256 uint32_t roc : 1;
257 uint32_t toc : 1;
258 } DaaCmdDesc0;
259 struct
260 {
261 uint32_t attr : 3;
262 uint32_t tid : 4;
263 uint32_t cmd : 8;
264 uint32_t cp : 1;
265 uint32_t idx : 5;
266 uint32_t rsvd : 1;
267 uint32_t lenthpos : 2;
268 uint32_t firstmode : 1;
269 uint32_t ofs16bit : 1;
270 uint32_t mode : 3;
271 uint32_t rnw : 1;
272 uint32_t roc : 1;
273 uint32_t toc : 1;
274 } ComboCmdDesc0;
275
276} am_hal_i3c_cmd_desc0_t;
277
278//
280//
281typedef union
282{
283 uint32_t ui32CmdDesc1;
284 struct
285 {
286 uint32_t def_byte : 8;
287 uint32_t rsvd : 8;
288 uint32_t data_len : 16;
289 } RegCmdDesc1;
290 struct
291 {
292 uint32_t byte1 : 8;
293 uint32_t byte2 : 8;
294 uint32_t byte3 : 8;
295 uint32_t byte4 : 8;
296 } ImmCmdDesc1;
297 struct
298 {
299 uint32_t sub_offset : 16;
300 uint32_t data_len : 16;
301 } ComboCmdDesc1;
302} am_hal_i3c_cmd_desc1_t;
303
304//
306//
307typedef struct
308{
309 bool bBLP;
310 bool bIOC;
311 uint16_t ui16BlkSize;
312 uint32_t ui32DatPtrLO;
313 uint32_t ui32DatPtrHI;
314} am_hal_i3c_data_desc_t;
315
316//
318//
319typedef union
320{
321 uint32_t ui32IbiStatus;
322 struct
323 {
324 uint32_t dat_len : 8;
325 uint32_t ibi_id : 8;
326 uint32_t chunks : 8;
327 uint32_t last_stat : 1;
328 uint32_t ts : 1;
329 uint32_t hw_ctx : 3;
330 uint32_t stat_type : 1;
331 uint32_t error : 1;
332 uint32_t ibi_sts : 1;
333 } IbiStatus;
334}am_hal_i3c_ibi_status_t;
335
336
337//
339//
340typedef struct
341{
342 void *pXfer;
343 void *pResp;
344 void *pIbiStat;
345 void *pIbiData;
346 uint32_t ui32XferAddr;
347 uint32_t ui32RespAddr;
348 uint32_t ui32IbiStatAddr;
349 uint32_t ui32IbiDataAddr;
350 uint32_t ui32XferStructSize;
351 uint32_t ui32RespStructSize;
352 uint32_t ui32IbiStatStructSize;
353 uint32_t ui32DeQptr;
354 am_hal_i3c_data_desc_t DataDesc;
355} am_hal_i3c_rh_t;

361typedef struct
362{
363 //
365 //

367 uint32_t ui32CmdRingBufLen;
368
369 //
371 //
372 uint32_t *pui32RespRingBuf;
373 uint32_t ui32RespRingBufLen;
374
375 //
377 //
378 uint32_t *pui32IbiStatRingBuf;

381 //

386
387 //
389 //

393//
395//
396typedef struct
397{
398 uint8_t ui8Addr;
399 uint8_t ui8Id;
400 uint8_t ui8Tid;

427//
429//
430typedef struct
431{
432 void *pHandle;
433 uint32_t ui32Module;
434 bool bInited;
435 uint32_t ui32HciVersion;
436 uint32_t ui32Capabilities;
437 uint32_t ui32DatTableSize;
438 uint32_t ui32DatTableOffset;
439 uint32_t ui32DctSectionOffset;
440 uint32_t ui32RHSectionOffset;
441 uint32_t ui32PioSectionOffset;
442 uint32_t ui32EXTCAPSectionOffset;
443 uint32_t ui32CAPID;
444 uint32_t ui32CAPLENGTH;
445 uint32_t ui32QueueSize;
446 uint32_t ui32RxBufSize;
447 uint32_t ui32TxBufSize;
448 uint32_t ui32IbiQueueSize;
449 am_hal_i3c_xfer_mode_e eXferMode;
450 am_hal_i3c_speed_mode_e eSpeedMode;
451 am_hal_i3c_cmd_data_t *pCmdData;
452 am_hal_i3c_ring_t *pRing;
453 am_hal_i3c_event_cb_t pfunCallback;
454 am_hal_i3c_event_t Event;
455} am_hal_i3c_host_t;
